getLogProb in interface GrammarRule<T extends Token>
Returns:

getAlignment

public int[] getAlignment()
Returns the alignment as an int array having the same length as the source RHS, where each index corresponds to a source word and each value corresponds to a target word. An array index containing the value -1 indicates that the source word is unaligned.

Returns:
